title: Mobile-Based Cognitive Apprenticeship English Learning Method: Microlearning Course for Beginner Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learner roles: students/job seekers, Delivery method: mobile app-based, Assessment method: project-based evaluation (portfolio/peer review), Technology environment: smartphones/tablets provided

learning_goals: Learners construct simple daily expressions with 80% accuracy using basic English sentence structures.
Learners exchange feedback with peers at least twice via mobile app collaboration features to improve communication skills.
Learners can identify individual areas of weakness and develop remedial learning plans through weekly learning log analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
